artisans.name: Samuel Ochieng
artisans.description: Experienced carpenter specializing in custom furniture, kitchen cabinets, and home renovations. Known for quality craftsmanship and timely delivery.

artisans.name: Grace Wanjiku
artisans.description: Professional tailor offering custom clothing, alterations, and traditional wear. Specializes in both modern and traditional African designs.

artisans.name: John Mwangi
artisans.description: Reliable plumber providing installation, repair, and maintenance services for residential and commercial properties. Available 24/7 for emergencies.

artisans.name: Mary Akinyi
artisans.description: Skilled mason with expertise in construction, tile work, and decorative stonework. Has worked on numerous residential and commercial projects.

artisans.name: Peter Kimani
artisans.description: Experienced auto mechanic specializing in car repairs, maintenance, and diagnostics. Works with all vehicle makes and models.

artisans.name: Ruth Nyong'o
artisans.description: Certified electrician providing electrical installation, repair, and maintenance services. Experienced in both residential and commercial electrical work.
